p: Heparinized total blood was collected through venipuncture and centrifuged for 8 h with Ficoll-Paque ™ specific gravity gradient 1077 (GE Healthcare). The PBMCs were collected, rinsed three times with phosphate buffer saline, and counted via trypan blue exclusion (Sigma-Aldrich, St. Louis, USA) in a Neubauer chamber. The cells were resuspended in aliquots of 2 x 10 6 PBMCs/mL in RPMI 1640 medium (GIBCO, Life Technologies, UK) containing 10% of inactivated fetal bovine serum (GIBCO, USA),followed by the addition of phytohemagglutinin in a concentration of 5 μg/mL (PHA-P, Sigma-Aldrich, St. Louis, MO, USA) [ 37].
